records.Name: Verify creation of a new account
records.ExpectedResult__c: The new account should be successfully created and saved without any errors.
records.StepstoComplete__c:
1. Log in to Salesforce.
  2. Navigate to the Accounts tab.
  3. Click on the "New" button to create a new account.
  4. Fill in the required fields such as Account Name, Account Number, and Account Owner.
  5. Click on the "Save" button to save the new account.

records.Name: Verify editing an existing contact details
records.ExpectedResult__c: The contact details should be successfully updated and saved without any issues.
records.StepstoComplete__c:
1. Log in to Salesforce.
  2. Navigate to the Contacts tab.
  3. Select an existing contact from the list.
  4. Click on the "Edit" button to modify contact details.
  5. Update the contact information such as email, phone number, and address.
  6. Click on the "Save" button to save the changes.

records.Name: Verify searching for an account
records.ExpectedResult__c: The system should display search results matching the entered account name, if any, allowing the user to easily locate the desired account.
records.StepstoComplete__c:
1. Log in to Salesforce.
  2. Navigate to the Accounts tab.
  3. Locate the search bar at the top of the page.
  4. Enter the name of an existing account into the search bar.
  5. Press the Enter key or click on the search icon.

records.Name: Verify deletion of a task
records.ExpectedResult__c: The selected task should be successfully deleted from the system without any errors.
records.StepstoComplete__c:
1. Log in to Salesforce.
  2. Navigate to the Tasks tab.
  3. Select an existing task from the list.
  4. Click on the "Delete" button to remove the selected task.
  5. Confirm the deletion when prompted.

records.Name: Creating a New Opportunity
records.ExpectedResult__c: The new opportunity should be successfully created and saved without any errors.
records.StepstoComplete__c:
1. Log in to Salesforce.
  2. Navigate to the Opportunities tab.
  3. Click on the "New" button to create a new opportunity.
  4. Fill in the required fields such as Opportunity Name, Close Date, Stage, and Amount.
  5. Associate the opportunity with an existing account and contact.
  6. Click on the "Save" button to save the new opportunity.
